PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE J.D. BRUCE McDONALD to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta, and a member ex officio of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta; and a Judge of the Court of Appeal for the Northwest Territories and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Nunavut during his tenure of office as a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of Alberta.
